content: I have a server I'd like to move to another host. It's within a VM so I can actually move it as it is, but I'd prefer a more up-to-date OS install anyway. I am only a few point releases behind. Do I have to consider anything other than Backup->Restore ?
Oktay X has marked this topic as resolved.
@Oktay X I assume you figured this out, but our backup+restore process is a straightforward way to migrate to new hardware.
Yes thank you. I realized I was already on Ubuntu 20.04 and didn't need an OS upgrade. So I ended up just importing the VM to the new server.
